commands.select_command: SELECT * FROM football.matches WHERE league_id = %s AND season = %s;
commands.insert_command: INSERT INTO football.matches (match_id, date, venue_id, league_id, season, round, home_team_id, away_team_id, status, minute, home_team_goals, away_team_goals) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
